articles.description: Shares of Adani Power have been hitting new record highs in recent session, riding high on strong power demand and bullish technical indicators.
articles.content: Shares of the Adani group's multibagger offering, Adani Power, scaled a fresh record high of Rs 652 on May 16, riding high on the wave of strong power demand during peak summers in the country. What'… [+2048 chars]
